            <entry>cahi1:data_2247db81ba03a500190ae6544a93e5456f6bc705</entry>

          <title>
            <string language="en">Hydrocarbon molecules in branched or straight chains</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kohlenwasserstoffmoleküle in ausgebrittenen oder 
geraden Ketten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Molécules d'hydrocarbure dans les chaînes 
embranchées ou droites</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Moléculas do hidrocarboneto em correntes 
ramificadas ou retas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molecole dell'idrocarburo in catene ramificate o 
diritte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μόρια υδρογονανθράκων στις διακλαδισμένες ή ευθείες 
αλυσίδες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Moléculas del hidrocarburo en encadenamientos 
ramificados o rectos</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These diagrams show the forms that hydrocarbon molecules may take, either a branched or a straight chain where carbon atoms make up the spine.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">carbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">branched chains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrocarbons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecular structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">molecules</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">straight chains</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Diagramme zeigen den Formularen, daß 
Kohlenwasserstoffmoleküle nehmen können, entweder eine ausgebrittene
oder gerade Kette, wo Kohlenstoffatome den Dorn bilden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces diagrammes prouvent aux formes que les 
molécules d'hydrocarbure peuvent prendre, une chaîne embranchée ou 
droite où les atomes de carbone composent l'épine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estes diagramas mostram aos formulários que as 
moléculas do hidrocarboneto podem fazer exame, uma corrente 
ramificada ou reta onde os átomos de carbono fazem acima o spine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questi schemi indicano alle forme che le molecole 
dell'idrocarburo possono prendere, una catena ramificata o diritta 
dove gli atomi di carbonio compongono la spina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτά τα διαγράμματα εμφανίζουν τις μορφές ότι μόρια 
υδρογονανθράκων μπορούν να πάρουν, είτε μια διακλαδισμένη είτε 
ευθεία αλυσίδα όπου τα άτομα άνθρακα αποτελούν τη σπονδυλική 
στήλη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estos diagramas muestran a formas que las 
moléculas del hidrocarburo pueden tomar, un encadenamiento ramificado
o recto donde los átomos de carbón hacen para arriba la espina 
dorsal.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
